text: Malosharipovo () is a rural locality (a village) in Araslanovsky Selsoviet, Meleuzovsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 237 as of 2010. There are 2 streets. == Geography == It is located 17 km from Meleuz, 7 km from Smakovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Meleuzovsky District
title: Malosharipovo
